data.description:
Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-charged world of Stunt Double Joe McFlash, where you step into the shoes of Hollywood's most celebrated stunt driver. As a special guest on a popular TV chat show, you get to share your breath-taking experiences from five iconic films.

The Lucky Man: Navigate the treacherous streets of a bustling thriller city, performing high-speed chases and evasive maneuvers to outwit your pursuers. 

The Country Boys: Set in the sun-soaked South of America, this film has you tearing up dirt roads, leaping over rustic barns, and jumping over trains. The southern charm and perilous stunts make every scene unforgettable.

Tropical Blunder: Venture deep into the jungle where nature is as unpredictable as the action sequences. This film culminates in an explosive volcano showdown, where you'll need to harness every bit of your driving skill to survive the chaos of erupting lava and collapsing terrain.

Arctic Blast: Experience the chilling thrill of driving in an icy world at the North Pole. From jumping over vast ice lakes to navigating through treacherous ice caves, the breathtakingly beautiful yet deadly environment will test your limits and your vehicle's endurance.

This Is The End: Set in a post-apocalyptic world covered in dust and desolation, you must navigate through a bleak desert landscape. With crumbling infrastructure and treacherous terrain, every stunt you perform could be your last as you race against the harsh elements and relentless dangers.

changelog.change_log: Update0.11:New control(Thumbstick),New Film The Knight Owl,Added effect throughout, SFX enhanced, UI updated.
Film1 Car Update better to control. More Effects added throughout. Some Checkpoint times adjusted.
Fixed a animation issue on Film1 Scene 7,update Film1 Scene6 lighting
